Source.Name: keychain
Source.Summary: agent manager for ssh and gnupg
Source.Description: Helps you to manage ssh and GPG keys in a convenient and secure manner. It acts as a frontend to ssh-agent and ssh-add, but allows you to easily have one long running ssh-agent process per system, rather than the norm of one ssh-agent per login session.
